header.h2: This is somewhat embarrassing, isn’t it?

div.p: It seems we can’t find what you’re looking for. Perhaps searching can help.

div.div: Boreal Paddle + Apparel s a life style store. We love to paddle, we love yoga, we love nature, and we love comfy.
